casebody.data:
Carlos CHAVEZ
v.
Irwin CARMICHAEL, Sheriff, Mecklenburg County Luis Lopez
v.
Irwin Carmichael, Sheriff, Mecklenburg County No. 437PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Sean F. Perrin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Carmichael, Irwin (Sheriff) Sejal Zota, Attorney at Law, W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Chavez, Carlos, et al. Erez Reuveni, Attorney at Law, Joshua S. Press, Attorney at Law, Gill P. Beck, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for United States R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for the State *400ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of December 2018 by Petitioners in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
